1�Press a button to continue.
1�Choose your path...Leave Promyvion.Return to the spire entrance.Nothing.
1�Return to the Beaucedine Glacier?Yes.No.
1�Return to the web of recollections?Yes.No.
1�Is the exit up ahead?Yes.No.
1�By Altana's tears...!
1�If we go any further, we will plunge into the Emptiness.
1�Nag'molada!?
1�You have met with Diabolos!?
1�Help  ?
1�Then we must backtrack and find another path.
1� , there was something I...
1�Ah, good to see you are all safe and well.
1�Hrmph...It seems that Diabolos spoke the truth.
1�Although I did think it strange that one could enter the Emptiness without being devoured by its darkness.
1�Yes, in his dreamworld of Dynamis.
1�He said that if I helped you,  , we would find a way out of this place.
1�Does the exit lie in this direction?
1�Well then, step aside.There is little light remaining within this vessel.
1�You should not embarrass yourself with petty lies.Now step aside. There is little light remaining within this vessel.
1�Selh'teus...As long as I have breath in my body, I will find you. No matter what it takes...!
1�Diabolos!If you had anything close to a soul, you'd know that pain comes with the package. There's no way around it, but it's what makes us who we are!
1�You're nothing but an empty shell. What happened to your soul!?
1�If you're going to live your life in fear of hurting someone, then you'll never be able to save anything!
1�...!Break the pact...Why didn't I think of that...?
1�Diabolos!If you had anything close to a soul, you'd know that pain comes with the package. There's no way around it, but it's what makes us who we are!
1�You're nothing but an empty shell. What happened to your soul!?
1�If you're going to live your life in fear of hurting someone, then you'll never be able to save anything!
1�Lord Diabolos...?
1�Is he truly planning to thrust Vana'diel into the abyss of the Emptiness?
1�I do not understand... Are you saying that there is a hidden realm beyond the fifth crystal?
1�So, the true reason Bahamut has deemed us his enemy lies in the curse...
1�Lord Diabolos! Is there any way to break these chains that bind us?
1�However, if we are not purified of this ??curse,?? whether it is one or not, there is no avoiding a battle with the Wyrmking!
1�And even if we are victorious...there is no stopping the Emptiness from swallowing all life in Vana'diel!
1�Prishe!
1�The will of Promathia...?Promathia's curse on mankind...?
1�Prishe...?
1�Prishe...?
1�Show yourself, Selh'teus!
1�Diabolos!Are you saying that you know what he is up to?
1�From where!?
1�That is ridiculous! The celestial capital was destroyed without a trace when the Zilart tried opening the Gates of Paradise over ten thousand years ago!
1�A safe place...?
1�And the Gates of Paradise... They could also be...
1�So we meet again, he who is one with Selh'teus...
1�Now that the light of the fourth crystal has been robbed, it will not be long before this land is infested by the Emptiness.
1�I fear that it may be impossible to thwart the plans of Selh'teus. If I had only realized earlier what he was attempting...
1�That may be the ultimate result of his actions; however, I do not feel it was his original intention.
1�No, I learned the true ambition of Selh'teus in the form of a dream--the dream of this girl.
1�Selh'teus has come from Al'Taieu on a mission to protect the celestial capital.
1�Child of the Kuluu, Al'Taieu was not destroyed as you thought. It still remains intact--its residents alive--resting in a safe place.
1�Beyond the fifth crystal.
1� ...Search out the final mothercrystal. There you will find the truth you seek.
1�Hah hah hah! Foolish children! Do you still aimlessly seek the dream of Paradise?
1�I must warn you. It is not your will that guides you to the gates...but the will of Promathia.
!?�You and every other soul on this world are slaves to the will of the Twilight God.
1�And that is why Bahamut, keeper of the Gates of Paradise, has set out to destroy you.
1�There is...one way...Long ago, remnants of the Kuluu came to me and asked me to release them from the chains of Promathia.
1�I did as they asked...However, the result was tragic. The Kuluu lost their original selves...
1�Children of Vana'diel!Promathia's curse is necessary for the survival of your species. Without it you would be nothing.
1�It is only a curse because that is the name you have given it. It is only your chains because that is what you make it.
1�There are no roads left for you to travel...Phoenix has been reduced to a mere fragment of her former self, while Fenrir, guardian of tomorrow, remains powerless.
1�And Carbuncle, bringer of rainbows, still ponders over whether to lend his hand to your cause.
1�This is because he realizes that he cannot save both of you. He must choose one: mankind or Vana'diel.
1�We must learn from Selh'teus and the mistake he has made.In attempting to save both sides, he only caused them much pain.
1�You know nothing, girl...
1�If you are so adamant about your cause, then why not carry the pain of all Vana'diel on your own?
1�Sacrifice yourself for this world and its children! If you die, Bahamut's pact would be broken and Vana'diel would be saved!
1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Desires of Emptiness(pt.1).Desires of Emptiness(pt.2).Desires of Emptiness(pt.3).Desires of Emptiness(pt.4).
